description: Node-only secure AI assistant: gateway, TUI, Telegram, skills, memory.

userStories.title: Gateway and dashboard
userStories.description: As a user, I want a WebSocket gateway and web dashboard so clients can connect.
acceptanceCriteria: Daemon runs WS gateway and optional HTTP dashboard on one port

userStories.title: Node runtime only

acceptanceCriteria: No Python entry points or requirements
All CLI and daemon implemented in Node (src/cli.js, src/daemon.js)
